Mp3 101 !!!

(1) Encode using LAME (itunes is CRAP using Fraunhofer encoder boo!!)

(2) Set encoder to VBR (variable bit rate) as LAME was engineered for this. CBR is CRAP and in all honesty a VBR altpreset standard at -2 is as good as a 320 CBR !!!! and file is WAY SMALLER!!!

(3) SET IT TO JOINT STEREO NOT "STEREO" and if I have to explain don't ask because you have no comprehension of what the setting actually does!!!

can't recommend this album if you use iTunes. It doesn't have the info properly on. other than that the quality is good.

For quality encoding, CD's should be encoded at 44.1 @ 256/320 CBR Stereo

VBR is only used for broadcasting or streaming. Joint Stereo is not true stereo and destroys the audio quality.

In 1995 MP3 was dropped from the standards in favour for AAC

If you do not believe me, read the standard or at least the wiki pages.
